column1: (1) Accrued purchases primarily reflects receipts of goods and services for which we had not yet been invoiced. As we are invoiced for these goods and
services, this balance will reduce and accounts payable will increase.
(2) Taxes payable includes value added tax, income tax, sales tax, property tax and use tax payables.
